mighty-warrior.english: The Lord is with you, mighty warrior

sword-of-the-lord.english: A sword for the Lord and for Gideon!

too-many-troops.hebrew: רַב הָעָם אֲשֶׁר אִתָּךְ מִתִּתִּי אֶת־מִדְיָן בְּיָדָם
too-many-troops.english: You have too many troops with you for Me to deliver Midian into their hands

three-hundred-men.hebrew: בִּשְׁלֹשׁ מֵאוֹת הָאִישׁ הַמְלַקְקִים אוֹשִׁיעַ אֶתְכֶם
three-hundred-men.english: With the three hundred men who lapped I will save you

the-lord-shall-rule.hebrew: לֹא־אֶמְשֹׁל אֲנִי בָכֶם יְהוָה יִמְשֹׁל בָּכֶם
the-lord-shall-rule.english: I will not rule over you; the Lord shall rule over you
